item.description:
For those of you, who are finding the money is a little tight this year (like me), and aren't going to The Common Man, for dinner prior to the dance, my home is open for a potluck meal, anytime after 4pm. We'll eat about 5pm, have a pre New Year's toast, and head to the dance about 7:30ish. I'm approx. 15 minutes from the Castleton.
In your reply put down what you could bring for eats...I've had enough sweets to last a lifetime...lol. must have gained 5 lbs. over Christmas :)
I will email my address and telephone number the day before to any "yes" or "maybe" responses.
Happy New Year...looking forward to starting it out right, with good friends, good food and good will towards men ;)
Susan

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Pre New Year's potluck!
